comments.comment: You must join hands with independent groups and defeat Gota now because almost all channels hide the TRUTH and HIGHLIGHT the lies because channels are paid by LOOTED money from Rajapakshas, Hiru and Derana. On the Sunday of bomb attacks, Shiranthi (Mahinda's wife) went to the Sunday mass early in the morning instead of mid day mass as usual mass time she had in the past. She had no doubts about the timing of the bombing as we now realised. Mah8nda's security informed him but he never did any thing to tell the Catholic clergy.
